Joined as an antidote to the hostile right-wing environment found on Twitter.  The kindness and generosity of the human spirit always prevails over bigotry and hatred. Here to see it shine through.  A lover of adventure, whether on foot, by bike or on the rails - windswept hilltops, remote passes and night trains to exotic places. Endlessly curious. Lover of maps. Always take the road less travelled. A metaphor for travelling and for life.

#Bylines

Serving you up news about the Bylines Network!

The #BylinesNetwork is a family of 10 online citizen journalism publications representing different regions, nations and accents of the UK. Progressive & internationalist, we like our democracy strong - locally, nationally and internationally.

This account provides the main chat for Bylines Network as a whole.
